# New York R Conference \| September 8-10, 2021

[![](images/NYR2020.png)](https://rstats.ai/nyr/#about)

### Workshops \| September 8, 2021

### Conference \| September, 9-10, 2021

The seventh annual [R Conference \| New York](https://rstats.ai/nyr/?utm_source=landeranalytics) will take place as a hybrid (in-person & virtual) event on September 9-10, 2021 with workshops on September 8th. More details to come. Follow [\@rstatsai](https://twitter.com/rstatsai/?utm_source=nyhackr) on Twitter.

If you are interested in being a sponsor for the 2021 New York R Conference, please contact us at [info\@landeranalytics.com](mailto:info@landeranalytics.com){.email}.

For more about the community, visit our website at [nyhackr.org](https://nyhackr.org/?utm_source=nyhackr), join our [slack team](https://nyhackr.slack.com/shared_invite/MTg0ODY4ODE2MjkwLTE0OTUwNTY3NTEtZGYzYzNiOTg2OA) and follow us on Twitter at [\@nyhackr](https://twitter.com/nyhackr) and [\@rstatsnyc](https://twitter.com/rstatsnyc) and follow the [\#rstatsnyc](https://twitter.com/hashtag/rstatsnyc) hashtag.
